(as of Nov 30,2022 04:33:44 UTC – Details)


Item Quantity: 425pcs and 1 Fasteners Removal Tool Package Includes: 55 pcs Weather-strip Retainer 35 pcs Fender& Bumper Shield Retainer 40 pcs Weather-strip Retainer 30 pcs Square Screw Nut 30 pcs Hood Insulation Retainer 30 pcs Fascia Retainer 25 pcs Retainer 20 pcs Push Type Retainer 20 pcs Retainer 20 pcs Push Type Retainer 20 pcs Trim Panel Retainer 20 pcs Push Type Retainer 15 pcs Fender& Bumper Shield Retainer 15 pcs Trim Panel Retainer 15 pcs Push Type Retainer 10 pcs Trim Panel Retainer 10 pcs Grille To Metal Stamping Retainer 5 pcs Bumper Retainer 10 pcs Tailgate Handle Rod Clip
【 WORKS FOR ALMOST ALL SITUATIONS】- The kit contains 19 types of most common sizes of fastener clips, cover 6mm to 10mm hole sizes replacement for Ford, GM, Chrysler, Toyota, Nissan, Mazda, Jeep, 2001 MR2 Spyder, 06 350z，1996 Ford F-250, motorcycles, Honda , Chevy Silverado. But NOT ONLY for these cars, if the sizes and shape meet your needs well, it’s also a useful kit.
【 IMPACT RESISTANT PUSH RIVETS】 – Well made of durable Nylon plastic, not easy to break or crack like other brands, it is super sturdy!
【 PREFECT FOR WHAT YOU NEED 】- Up to 425 pieces of retainer clips in a plastic box, allows to freely DIY your vehicle accessories at anytime you wanted.
【 BONUS FASTENER REMOVER】 – Allow you to quickly and easily remove car door panel and upholstery clips without causing damage to them. Easy access into confined areas.
【 WIDELY APPLICATION】- Theses push clips are widely used for trim panel clips, door trim clips, door panel clips, bumper clips, Fender clips, engine cover and splash shield retainers replacement. It always covers some applications include telecom equipment, motor vehicles, domestic appliances, furniture and electrical equipment.

Read more

GOOACC is a famous brand that dedicated to providing innovative, cost-effective and quality products. We have been specialized in automotive products and parts for many years.

Constant improvement and innovation is our eternal aim. Hope you can purchase with satisfaction here!

425 Pcs Car Body Retainer Assortment Clips Set & Fastener Remover

35 Pcs – OEM: 6030441 [Hole Size: 5.6mm- fender and bumper shield retainer]

15 Pcs – OEM: N801925-S [Hole Size: 8mm – door panel retainer]

55 Pcs – OEM: 67867-0C010 [Hole Size: 6.2mm – weatherstrip retainer]

  • 10 Pcs – OEM: N387496S [Hole Size: 8mm – door panel retainers] 20 Pcs – OEM: 82315-27000 [Hole Size: 11mm – trim panel retainer]
  • 30 Pcs – OEM: 90467-06017 [Hole Size: 6mm – push-type retainer] 20 Pcs – OEM: N807721-S [Hole Size: 10mm – trim panel retainer]
  • 20 Pcs – OEM: NA01-56145 [Hole Size: 8.2mm – push-type retainer] 40 Pcs – OEM: 20413107 [Hole Size: 4.8*5.2mm – weatherstrip retainer]
  • 10 Pcs – OEM: 387944-S [Hole Size: 10mm – push-type retainer] 30 Pcs – OEM: GA2A-56694 [Hole Size: 5.5*6mm – hood insulation retainer]
  • 20 Pcs – Non-OEM [Hole Size: 6.7mm – push-type retainers] 25 Pcs – OEM: 14019206 [Hole Size: 6.5mm – push-type retainers]
  • 20 Pcs – Non-OEM [Hole Size: 6mm – push-type retainer] 50 Pcs – Non-OEM [Hole Size: 7mm – wheaterstrip retainer]

item.title: Porch Lights with GFCI Outlet,Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights,3 Lighting Modes White Front Door Lights,Waterproof Outside Wall sconces for House Patio Garage
item.dc:creator: admin

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Brand ‎Myhaptim
Color ‎White
Material ‎‎Aluminum, Glass
Style ‎‎Classic,Retro
Light fixture form ‎Sconce
Room Type ‎Patio, garage, balcony, decks, porches, doorways, gardens, hallways, entryways
Indoor/Outdoor Usage ‎Outdoor
Power Source ‎AC
Product Dimensions ‎8.85″L x 5.9″W x 11.8″H
Special Feature ‎‎Waterproof, Dusk to Dawn, Water Resistant, 2 Built-in GFCI Outlets, Motion Sensor
Control Method ‎Remote
Light Source Type ‎‎LED, Incandescent
Finish Type ‎Polished
Shade Material ‎Glass
Voltage ‎125 Volts
Included Components ‎Bulb
Item Weight ‎4.4 Pounds
Item Package Quantity ‎1
Manufacturer ‎Myhaptim
Part Number ‎3215-1
Item Weight ‎4.4 pounds
Product Dimensions ‎8.85 x 5.9 x 11.8 inches
Country of Origin ‎China
Item model number ‎3215
Assembled Height ‎11.8 inches
Assembled Length ‎8.85 inches
Assembled Width ‎5.9 inches
Finish Types ‎Polished
Special Features ‎‎Waterproof, Dusk to Dawn, Water Resistant, 2 Built-in GFCI Outlets, Motion Sensor
Shade Color ‎White
Switch Style ‎Push Button
Switch Installation Type ‎Wall Mount
Batteries Required? ‎No

Additional Information

ASIN B0BHMWXW4J
Best Sellers Rank #42,090 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)
#198 in Patio Wall Light Fixture
Date First Available October 8, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $69.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:27 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270°

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

【3 LIGHT MODES】: The upgraded outdoor lights are built-in dusk to dawn motion sensor and bringing 3 working modes. (Manual / Low / High)①Manual mode: just turn the wall-mounted switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2 secondso shift to manual mode,keeping 100% brightness for 8 hours at night ,the dusk-to-dawn sensor detects morning and will automatically turn off. (Note: light switch in ON position, Sensing distance: 33FT, Sensing angle: 270°),②Low Mode: Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection. ③High Mode: These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected
【CLASSIC STYLE & MULTIPLE-SCENE】: Vintage rustic design that adds sophistication to any outdoor decor, this outside lights the aluminum finish pairs perfectly with most outdoor occasions, such as patio,garages,balcony,front porches,doorways,gardens,hallways
【WEATHER RESISTANT & STURDY MATERIAL】: White dusk to dawn motion sensor front porch lights , using rust-proof metal frame and thickened reinforced tempered water glass as a lampshade, lamp bezel coating waterproof golden quality aluminum, can waterproof, corrosion-resistant, anti-rust, can effectively resist heavy rain, snow, ice, high temperature and other weather, in these weather conditions, can be used for a longer period of time than the light fixtures on the market and don’t worry about the quality of the problem.
【RECOMMENDED BULB & E26 BASE】: Our outdoor wall sconce does not include a bulb and uses a UL listed E26 base for long life, compatible with any kind of standard E26 LED bulb/incandescent bulb (Max 60W), the open design of the bottom of this fixture makes it easy for you to install the bulb or clean the fixture without disassembly, for a better experience, it is recommended to choose a dimmable incandescent or LED bulb, otherwise it will malfunction or flicker
【EASY INSTALLATION】: The package of the porch light comes with installation instructions and mounting hardware, just finish the installation on the wall, remember to press the “Reset” or “Test” button between the GFCI sockets to reset the sockets and test the use, otherwise the light will probably not turn on, there will be no power output on the sockets, induction Sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time are not adjustable, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this outdoor light.
【IMPORTANT NOTE】When the motion sensing is on for the first time (Enter Test Mode, it can also be sensed during the day in this mode), the light will be turned off after 5 seconds. When the motion sensing is on again after 2 minutes (Automatically Enter Normal Working Mode, it only can be sensed on the night in this mode), the light will be turned off after 2 minutes. After that, every time it is sensed, it is Normal Working Mode.If you are not familiar with electrical knowledge, please contact an electrician to install
【3-Year Warranty】We provide 3 years warranty and replacement or refund within 30 days; Although we trust the premium design and high-end quality of our product, if you are not satisfied, you can ask for a full refund with no additional questions asked. If you have any questions about our products, please log in to your account, check the order ID and click “Contact Seller” to contact us;Our customer service will solve your problem within 24 hours

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

  • When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.
  • Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270°

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

Read more

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Read more

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

Price: $69.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:27 UTC – Details)

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $69.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:14 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270°

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party décor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

【3 LIGHT MODES】: The upgraded outdoor lights are built-in dusk to dawn motion sensor and bringing 3 working modes. (Manual / Low / High)①Manual mode: just turn the wall-mounted switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2 secondso shift to manual mode,keeping 100% brightness for 8 hours at night ,the dusk-to-dawn sensor detects morning and will automatically turn off. (Note: light switch in ON position, Sensing distance: 33FT, Sensing angle: 270°),②Low Mode: Saving electricity for you, it won’t turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection. ③High Mode: These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected
【CLASSIC STYLE & MULTIPLE-SCENE】: Vintage rustic design that adds sophistication to any outdoor decor, this outside lights the aluminum finish pairs perfectly with most outdoor occasions, such as patio,garages,balcony,front porches,doorways,gardens,hallways
【WEATHER RESISTANT & STURDY MATERIAL】: White dusk to dawn motion sensor front porch lights , using rust-proof metal frame and thickened reinforced tempered water glass as a lampshade, lamp bezel coating waterproof golden quality aluminum, can waterproof, corrosion-resistant, anti-rust, can effectively resist heavy rain, snow, ice, high temperature and other weather, in these weather conditions, can be used for a longer period of time than the light fixtures on the market and don’t worry about the quality of the problem.
【RECOMMENDED BULB & E26 BASE】: Our outdoor wall sconce does not include a bulb and uses a UL listed E26 base for long life, compatible with any kind of standard E26 LED bulb/incandescent bulb (Max 60W), the open design of the bottom of this fixture makes it easy for you to install the bulb or clean the fixture without disassembly, for a better experience, it is recommended to choose a dimmable incandescent or LED bulb, otherwise it will malfunction or flicker
【EASY INSTALLATION】: The package of the porch light comes with installation instructions and mounting hardware, just finish the installation on the wall, remember to press the “Reset” or “Test” button between the GFCI sockets to reset the sockets and test the use, otherwise the light will probably not turn on, there will be no power output on the sockets, induction Sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time are not adjustable, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this outdoor light.
【IMPORTANT NOTE】When the motion sensing is on for the first time (Enter Test Mode, it can also be sensed during the day in this mode), the light will be turned off after 5 seconds. When the motion sensing is on again after 2 minutes (Automatically Enter Normal Working Mode, it only can be sensed on the night in this mode), the light will be turned off after 2 minutes. After that, every time it is sensed, it is Normal Working Mode.If you are not familiar with electrical knowledge, please contact an electrician to install
【3-Year Warranty】We provide 3 years warranty and replacement or refund within 30 days; Although we trust the premium design and high-end quality of our product, if you are not satisfied, you can ask for a full refund with no additional questions asked. If you have any questions about our products, please log in to your account, check the order ID and click “Contact Seller” to contact us;Our customer service will solve your problem within 24 hours

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

  • When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.
  • Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Perfect for decorating your outdoor porch light, your garage door lights, or even your lamp post for home decorations!Professional Brand: OurWarm Specialize in Providing Perfect Service for parties, such as Wedding, Home parties, Halloween, Christmas, Graduation, Fall, and Thanksgiving.

Features

1. Greet family and friends with a glowing welcome from this cute snowman.

2. Protect the bulb from being damaged or covered and gather the light for a better view. Perfect decorations for your home, workspaces, family gatherings, banquets, etc.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The easy-access IRIS 24” Exercise 4-panel pet playpen with door is perfect for puppies, extra small to medium sized dogs and other family pets. Use it as an indoor dog fence, play gate, dog play yards, or dog exercise pens. The portable playpen for dog provides 8 square feet of ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:20:34 UTC – Details)


The easy-access IRIS 24” Exercise 4-panel pet playpen with door is perfect for puppies, extra small to medium sized dogs and other family pets. Use it as an indoor dog fence, play gate, dog play yards, or dog exercise pens. The portable playpen for dog provides 8 square feet of play space for pets. Each panel of the IRIS playpen measures 33.6″ W x 24″ H, doors are 14.5” W x 16.5” H and the distance between bars is 1.7”. Built-in locks on the pet pen door twist to open for easy pet entry. The durable molded indoor pet pen will last for years. Pet pens can be positioned in different shapes to best suit your space capacity and pet’s needs. The plastic panel on the dog playpen with door securely snaps together to keep your pet inside. The panels for dog exercise pen with door also feature a non-skid rubber foot to protect flooring.

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07FDHB4NC

The IRIS playpen is portable and provides 8 square feet of play space for dogs, cats, and other pets
Pet playpen with door is made of durable molded plastic

Product Description

SLEEK AND DURABLE SET – Our premium grade Auto Trim Removal Tools fits in any crevices and works excellent in removing exterior & interior trim, molding, wheel hubs, door panels, fasteners, dashboards, and more without scratching or damaging your car.
UNIVERSAL AUTO TRIM REMOVAL TOOLS – It includes 5 job specific auto trim removal tools to make internal and external automotive removals easy. It is designed with care to be universally applicable to vehicles, boats, RVs and more so you can make repairs and maintenance with ease while also protecting the aesthetic of your car with its sleek design.
UNIQUE ERGONOMIC DESIGN – Made of sturdy and pliable nylon material with a unique ergonomic design that enables the tools to be easily handled to effectively save effort and time while working on laborious repair or maintenance tasks.
EASY & CONVENIENT – Perfect for professionals and beginners doing any care modifications. It’s also compact in size which makes it easy and convenient to carry or stash in your car so you can use it anytime, anywhere.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – We are confident you’d love these tools as much as we do! Get yours now and perform repair or maintenance tasks like a pro!

Clip Nuts Automotive are Widely Used on Various Vehicles Dash Door Panel Clamping Projects,for Door Trim,Fender,Bumper,Radiator,Shield yoke,Side Skirt,Grille,Engine Cover ect.
The U clips Well Made of Spring Steel with Black Oxide Finish;The Screw is Finished by Zinc Plated.High Quality Material with Heavy-duty Construction for Durability,This Screw Clips Set Would not Break or crack Easily During Use.
Automotive Clips Package Includes 4 Popular Screw Size:3*8mm,4*16mm,5*12mm,6*20mm and 5 Common U Clips:3mm,4mm,5mm,6mm,3mm.Total 170pcs assorted in a Compact Plastic Case,It’s Convenient to Carry Out.
